sources.title: Greedy Humpty Dumpty (1936)
sources.description: Greedy Humpty Dumpty's wall of gold is not enough. He wants all the gold in the sun, too. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/greedy-humpty-dumpty-1936/

metadata.Plot: King Humpty Dumpty has a huge amount of gold, but wants more. He sees the sun, and thinks it is full of gold, so he orders his subjects (the various Mother Goose characters) to build his golden wall higher. They comply, and he reaches the sun, but when he does, the sun sends lightning bolts after him, which topple the wall.
metadata.Actors: Jack Mercer, Gus Wicke, Mae Questel
